title: Sandra Bullock looks chic in an all black outfit as she gets out of her black SUV in Los Angeles
text:
She's made some 57 movies in the 30 years between Hangman in February 1988 and Ocean's Eight in June 2018.

Now Sandra Bullock is enjoying some well deserved time off from showbiz, although she did put in an appearance at the ESPY Awards for athletes on July 10 in downtown Los Angeles.

The Speed star, 55, was all smiles when she was spotted out and about in the city on Thursday.

Scroll down for videos

You can't miss that smile: Sandra Bullock grinned as she got out of her black SUV wearing a black quilted jacket in Los Angeles on Thursday

The beautiful brunette left her black SUV in a parking lot before walking off.

Sandra matched the color of her car in a black quilted jacket that she wore over a black T-shirt and black leggings plus black sneakers with pink laces and soles.

The Miss Congeniality actress covered her eyes with sunglasses on the bright day and didn't appear to be wearing much in the way of make-up.

There was no sign of her photographer beau Bryan Randall, 53.

Out and about: The Miss Congeniality star, 55, teamed the jacket with a black T-shirt and skin-tight black leggings

They have been together for four years since meeting in January 2015 when he helped to take snaps of her son's birthday party.

Bryan even co-parents Sandra's adopted children, nine-year-old Louis and Laila, seven, according to insiders.

He is also father to his 25-year-old daughter Skylar, whom he had with his ex-fiancee Janine Staten before she died of a drug overdose in 2007.

The only part of her outfit that wasn't black were the pink laces and soles of her sneakers

The Oscar winning actress has only been married once - to TV personality Jesse James, 50. The two met in 2003 and tied the knot in 2005.

But in March 2010 after her award season run for her movie The Blind Side, it came out that Jesse had been having affairs while she was away filming.

He apologized publicly to Sandra but she filed for divorce later that year.
description: The 55-year-old Ocean's Eight star, who is enjoying some well deserved time off from showbiz after appearing n 57 movies in the last 30 years, was spotted out and about in Los Angeles on Thursday.
